thread.title: MARASI & FRANCO
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by MARASI & FRANCO

author: MARASI & FRANCO
title: MARASI & FRANCO
text: I recently called to oplace an order for one item. The service person with whom I spoke was very pleasant, took my order capably and respectfully, and answered all of my questions. The order was at my door within 2-3 days and was exactly what I had ordered. I have been doing business with Blumberg for many years and have always been satisfied with their products and service.
